news_title: Bitcoin Exchange Reserves Drop 400K Coins in One Year
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Santiment's Sanbase dashboard shows exchange reserves have declined by over 403,000 $BTC in the 12 months since Dec. 7, 2024. The drawdown represents roughly 2% of total supply. CoinGlass data indicates exchanges currently hold approximately 2.11 million coins, measu...

news_title: Bitcoin Holds Near $90,000 Ahead of Fed Rate Decision
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Markets entered a cautious holding pattern Tuesday with Bitcoin trading close to $90,000 ahead of the Federal Reserve's final 2025 policy announcement. Analysts from Nansen and BRN suggested Chair Jerome Powell's commentary may prove more consequential than the rate ...

news_title: Jack Mallers' Twenty One Capital Goes Public With $3.9B Bitcoin Treasury
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Jack Mallers' Twenty One Capital began trading Tuesday on the New York Stock Exchange following its merger with Cantor Equity Partners. The company operates under ticker XXI and holds 43,514 Bitcoin valued at approximately $3.9 billion. The treasury ranks third among...

news_title: Bitcoin Spikes to $94K as Shorts Face Largest Liquidation Wave
news_subtitle: Bitcoin News Bitcoin climbed above $94,400 on Tuesday, its strongest level since mid-November, as traders positioned ahead of the Federal Reserve's Wednesday policy announcement. The asset gained 5% over 24 hours after spending recent days near $90,000. Altcoins outperformed the ...

news_title: Bitcoin ‘After Dark’ ETF Targets Overnight Price Movement Gains

news_title: Strive Launches $500M Stock Offering for Bitcoin Purchases
